section.name: DPML Community
section.p: The Digital Product Meta Library is a global community project contributing to the development of advanced Java-based component management solutions. The initial community was formed from a core group of Apache developers focussed on the next generation of component management solutions (a.k.a beyond Avalon). The community established itself with general principals of "low barrier to entry", the "flock of bird" principal concerning evolution, and a high priority on commerical friendliness. Development during 2005 witnessed a a movement towards a greater product-driven focus and the core community is currently focussed on our first release and the parrallel development of the the operational and administrative processes aimed towards the growth and development of a self-sustaining community.

One of our aims is the creation of a non-profit organization, which we anticipate to get incorporated in Q1-2006. This will allow us to engage in more formal activities, establish better infrastructure, marketing materials and much more.
